title._content: [Unidentified soldier in Union corporal's uniform with viola]  (LOC)

description._content: [Unidentified soldier in Union corporal's uniform with viola] [between 1861 and 1865] 1 photograph : sixth-plate ambrotype, hand-colored ; 9.4 x 8.2 cm (case) Notes: Title devised by Library staff. Case: Rinhart, no. 267. Use digital images. Original served only by appointment because material requires special handling. For more information see: (www.loc.gov/rr/print/info/617_apptonly.html) Deposit; Tom Liljenquist; 2012; (D066) Purchased from: Medhurst & Co., Olathe, Kansas, 2012. Forms part of: Liljenquist Family Collection of Civil War Photographs (Library of Congress). Forms part of: Ambrotype/Tintype photograph filing series (Library of Congress). Exhibited: "The Civil War in America" at the Library of Congress, Washington, D.C., 2013. Subjects: United States.--Army--People--1860-1870. Soldiers--Union--1860-1870. Military uniforms--Union--1860-1870. Musicians--1860-1870. Violas--1860-1870. United States--History--Civil War, 1861-1865--Military personnel--Union. Format: Portrait photographs--1860-1870. Ambrotypes--Hand-colored--1860-1870. Rights Info: No known restrictions on publication. Repository: Library of Congress, Prints and Photographs Division, Washington, D.C. 20540 USA, hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/pp.print Part Of: Ambrotype/Tintype filing series (Library of Congress) (DLC) 2010650518 Liljenquist Family collection (Library of Congress) (DLC) 2010650519 More information about this collection is available at hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/pp.lilj Higher resolution image is available (Persistent URL): hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/ppmsca.34958 Call Number: AMB/TIN no. 3056
